author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1505152, some housekeeping. No functional changes.
(_find_jdk): Remove two print statements used for testing.

author: rhuijben
msg: Replace specialized handling of the jdk paths in the windows project generator
with using the standard dependency framework.
(java-sdk): New external library project. Currently not really a library.
(get_win_includes): Remove unused common include dir and jdk includes.
(get_win_lib_dirs): Easy out on libraries that don't link dependencies
(_find_jdk): Create a library instance with build information.

author: rec
msg: No jira - added internal experimental code to consolidate duplicate information in an aggregate analysis engine description

author: rec
msg: [UIMA-3093] Specifying other classes, such as FileResourceSpecifier_impl, as resource specifiers causes IllegalClassException when binding
